name: What rating method – Ska, BREEAM or LEED?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Ska, BREEAM and LEED are crucial in assessing the sustainability of your buildings. This session will look at and compare these accreditations; and will also look at the next generation assessment methods.

presentations.name: BREEAM vs LEED vs SKA - The battle of the accreditations’
